synonyms.synonym: Water channel protein for red blood cells and kidney proximal tubule

protein.specific_function: Forms a water-specific channel that provides the plasma membranes of red cells and kidney proximal tubules with high permeability to water, thereby permitting water to move in the direction of an osmotic gradient
